projects.title: Programmable POV LED Strip Poi
projects.description: Interactive LED poi using persistence of vision effects to create stunning light displays. Features programmable patterns, motion sensors, and wireless synchronization for dynamic flow art performances.
projects.longDescription: This project combines my passion for flow arts with advanced electronics programming. The poi create visual patterns through precisely timed LED sequences that appear to float in the air due to persistence of vision effects. Each poi contains 144 individually addressable LEDs, an IMU for motion detection, and wireless communication for synchronized performances.

projects.title: Personal Organization App
projects.description: Streamlined task management and productivity application built with modern web technologies. Features project tracking, time management, and workflow optimization for creative professionals.
projects.longDescription: Designed specifically for makers and creatives who juggle multiple projects across different disciplines. The app intelligently categorizes tasks by project type, tracks time spent on different activities, and provides insights into productivity patterns.
challenges: Ensuring fast performance with large datasets

projects.title: Custom Dining Tables
projects.description: Handcrafted dining tables featuring traditional joinery techniques and modern design aesthetics. Each piece is custom-designed and built using sustainably sourced hardwoods.
projects.longDescription: These tables represent the intersection of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. Using mortise and tenon joinery exclusively, each table is built to last generations while incorporating modern proportions and finishes that complement today's living spaces.

projects.title: Garmin Flow Arts Apps
projects.description: Custom Garmin Connect IQ applications for flow arts training and performance tracking.

projects.title: Modular Flow Toys
projects.description: Customizable hardware platform for creating various flow art props with interchangeable components.

projects.title: Modular Shelf System
projects.description: Precision laser-cut modular shelving system with customizable configurations.
